sentences.sContent: ...an evenhanded approach to the war on drugs.
sentences.sCn: ...反毒品战中公正无私的做法。

remMethod.val: even(平的) + hand(手) + ed → 两手放得一样平 → 公平的

trans.tranCn: 公平的， 不偏不倚的
trans.tranOther: If someone is evenhanded, they are completely fair, especially when they are judging other people or dealing with two groups of people
